items.text: mistimes this slap to mid-off but scampers a run.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: beaten as he looks to cut. Not all that short, deviated away a wee bit too.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: whipped uppishly, on the bounce to midwicket.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.preText: Adnan Nizhum: "From the beginning of his captaincy, Mashrafe is underestimating bowler Mahmudullah. We have seen it in BPL, how much effective his finger spin in limited over. As a right arm finger spinner, Mosaddek is good but Mahmudullah is better to me."
items.text: just eludes mid-off. Another slower length ball, had to force the pace to flat-bat this up and over, no timing on this.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 2 runs
Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: punched wide of midwicket as they scamper a run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, 1 run

items.text: just past the outstretched hands of mid-off as he ran across. Lost his shape completely in trying to slog this. Another lucky break
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: right forward with bat close to the pad as he defends back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: works this off his pad to the man coming in from deep midwicket. Superb running.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: drills this half-volley straight to the edge of the ring at cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, no run

items.text: this is some comeback. Throws it full and wide, he gets underneath the length and carves this inside-out to deep cover. Bounces past the sweeper there. Good effort, but not good enough. Did all the hard work in getting to the ball but couldn't get the slide in properly
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: hammered back past the bowler, long-on and long-off converge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, 1 run

items.text: punches this length ball to cover.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: steers this towards point as they scamper a run
items.postText: Andre Russell is seen nursing his left hamstring with ice
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: picks the length so very early and clobbers this half-tracker to the deep square leg fence. Too easy.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: eases this full delivery down to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: slower length ball which he dabs into the off side to scamper a run. They've gone upstairs to check for a run-out. This was a touch risky as the throw came in from short cover, but looks like he's just in.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, 1 run

items.text: swing and a miss. This length ball slid back in to hit him on the body, they scamper a legbye
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 1 leg bye

items.text: slower length ball which he muscles towards wide long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Powell, 1 run

items.text: long-on can only watch this sail over. This is magnificent. Picked the slower ball off the hand, got underneath the length, on one knee as he swung this cleanly over the ropes. So stylish. Held his pose for the shutterbugs. Deep into the stands as well
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, SIX runs

items.text: slanting into the pads, clipped to short fine leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: makes room and punches this shortish delivery to long-off, called for the second and made it even as his partner was made to stretch. A better throw and things would've been different. Also Shakib didn't collect the ball cleanly
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: sails over wide long-off. This is superb. Made room, but Shakib drifted this wider. No problem, he reached out and then flat-batted this over the ropes. Held his shape superbly
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, SIX runs

items.text: works this down to long-on, Rovman was injured a couple of deliveries ago trying to dive but that doesn't dissuade him from scampering a second
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 2 runs

items.text: punched back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run
